mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gallery ( gallary_id, idx, gallary_adress, gallary_time, gallary_seseon, gallary_direaction, gallary_name, gallary_image_location, gallary_subscibe_count ) VALUES ( #{gallaryId}, #{idx}, #{gallaryAdress}, #{gallaryTime}, #{gallarySeseon}, #{gallaryDireaction}, #{gallaryName}, #{gallaryImageLocation}, #{gallarySubscribeCount} )
